description: vol. 3 (farāʼiḍ - nafaqāt). ff. 118. 267 x 181; 188 x 120 mm. 31 lin. Dhū al-ḥijjah 997; on last fol. the commentatorʼs autogr. certificate of collation. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 498 (commentary 20); S I, 681. Incip. (kitāb al-farāʼiḍ) : ... کتاب الفرائض اى مسائل قسمة الموارىث جمع فرىضة
author: Ramlī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1513-1596
title: Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj.
creator: Ramlī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1513-1596
subject: Nawawī, 1233-1277—Minhāj al-ṭālibīn.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
